General.Name: Korea Air Svc
General.Description: Korea Airport Service Co.,Ltd. provides aircraft ground handling services in South Korea. It offers aircraft ground handling equipment rental and air cargo handling services. The company also manufactures and sells drinking spring water. In addition, it is involved in limestone mining activities; and livestock and agriculture business. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
